Settings History Show Tutorial About
Invalid expression Cannot divide by 0 Value too large Domain error Error
Share Cannot share invalid expression Choose Delete Button Simply LONG PRESS DELETE button to clear the calculator screen Angle Button This is the angle button. Click here to change angle from DEGREES to RADIANS and vice versa. Options Menu This is options menu. This will help you to change app settings and preferences. Click here to open the menu. Share Button This is the share button. Click here to share your equations. Memory Store This is memory store button. It will store the current result in the memory. Memory Restore This is memory restore button. It will put the result from the memory onto the screen.
